i1.name: Hextech Affinity
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Heimerdinger''' gains {{sti|ms|{{as|20% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} while near an allied {{tip|turret}} or a {{ai|H-28G Evolution Turret|Heimerdinger}} or {{ai|H-28Q Apex Turret|Heimerdinger}} deployed by him.
i1.descriptionHtml: Innate: Heimerdinger gains 20% bonus movement speed while near an allied turret or a H-28G Evolution Turret or H-28Q Apex Turret deployed by him.

r1.name: UPGRADE!!!
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Heimerdinger''' empowers his next basic [[Champion ability|ability]], placing it on the same {{sti|cooldown}} as its basic form, modifying its damage and making it {{tt|free to cast|Does not consume mana}}. ''UPGRADE!!!'' can be recast after 3 seconds while it is ready to empower.
{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Heimerdinger''' ends ''UPGRADE!!!'' and puts it on a 3-second cooldown.
''UPGRADE!!! can be used while affected by {{tip|cast-inhibiting crowd control}}.''
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Heimerdinger empowers his next basic Champion ability, placing it on the same cooldown as its basic form, modifying its damage and making it free to cast. UPGRADE!!! can be recast after 3 seconds while it is ready to empower.
Recast: Heimerdinger ends UPGRADE!!! and puts it on a 3-second cooldown.
UPGRADE!!! can be used while affected by cast-inhibiting crowd control.
r1.notes:
*Toggle abilities do not count as ability activations for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
**Consuming the buff for an empowered basic [[Champion ability|ability]] does.
* No compensations for {{sti|{{as|mana}}}} are made if ''UPGRADE!!!'' is recast.
